results.title: Targeting inflammation and redox perturbations by lisinopril mitigates Freund's adjuvant-induced arthritis in rats: role of JAK-2/STAT-3/RANKL axis, MMPs, and VEGF.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ attenuated adjuvant-induced @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001168 @@@arthritis@@@ via inhibition of @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, articular degradation cues, and angiogenesis.

citations.NLM: Arab HH, Abd El-Aal SA, Ashour AM, El-Sheikh AAK, Al Khabbaz HJ, Arafa EA, Mahmoud AM, Kabel AM. Targeting inflammation and redox perturbations by lisinopril mitigates Freund's adjuvant-induced arthritis in rats: role of JAK-2/STAT-3/RANKL axis, MMPs, and VEGF. Inflammopharmacology. 2022 Oct;30(5):1909-1926. PMID: 35764864

results.title: Effects of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs on hypertension control using angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors and thiazide diuretics.
results.text_hl: DESIGN: Fifteen @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001168 @@@arthritis@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ who were receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@HCT@@@, and administered sequentially in random order @CHEMICAL_Ibuprofen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007052 @@@ibuprofen@@@, @CHEMICAL_Sulindac @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013467 @@@sulindac@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Diclofenac @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004008 @@@diclofenac@@@ for one month each, with an intervening two-week washout period between each treatment period.

citations.NLM: Bhagat K. Effects of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs on hypertension control using angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors and thiazide diuretics. East Afr Med J. 2001 Oct;78(10):507-9. PMID: 11921591
citations.BibTeX: @article{11921591, title={Effects of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs on hypertension control using angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors and thiazide diuretics.}, author={Bhagat K}, journal={East Afr Med J}, volume={78}, number={10}, pages={507-9}}
